mapper.select: SELECT q.question_id AS question_id, MAX(q.question_title) AS title, MAX(q.question_body) AS question_body, STRING_AGG(DISTINCT ctq.tag, ',') AS tags FROM question q LEFT JOIN connection_tag_and_question ctq ON q.question_id = ctq.question_id WHERE q.question_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR q.question_body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ctq.tag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') GROUP BY q.question_id

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT q.question_id) AS total_questions FROM question q LEFT JOIN connection_tag_and_question ctq ON q.question_id = ctq.question_id
WHERE q.question_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR q.question_body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ctq.tag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
